channel.title: Docker on aonemd
channel.description: Recent content in Docker on aonemd

item.title: And a Whale Said Let There Be Docker
item.description: Every time I had to work on a new machine or I wanted to try a new technology, I used to install a lot of packages and libraries to prepare my development environment. I always struggled to manage dependencies and different versions of packages. That mostly worked for me but I had to go over this hustle everytime. Besides, after some time the machine I was working on used to get a bit slower.
